name: Death Field
description: The deadly power of the Negative Energy Plane creates a field that snuffs out life forces at the cost of your own vitality.
benefit: As a move action, you can exude deadly energy from your body. While this death field is in effect, small plants wither and recoil from you, allowing you to ignore the effects of difficult terrain caused by plant life and ignore the effects of spells like entangle that compel vegetation to grasp at you, provided the spellâ€™s level is 3rd or lower (the death field cannot affect more powerful plant magic).
